column2: "Na aber a Seba ɔhembaa no tsee Solomon ne nka no
column3: nna ɔbaa dɛ ɔdze nsɛmbisa dzendzen robɔsɔ Solomon ahwɛ wɔ Jerusalɛm
column7: na abo a ɔsom bo; na aber a ɔbaa Solomon nkyɛn no
column8: ɔnye no twetwee dza ɔwɔ n'akoma mu nyinara ho nkɔmbɔ."

column2: "Na Solomon maa no ne nsɛmbisa nyinara ho mbuae: na asɛm biara nnyi hɔ a Solomon enntum amma no mbuae."
"Na aber a Seba ɔhembaa no hun Solomon ne nyansaa
column3: na ofi a oesi
column8: na hɔn ntar; ne nsahyɛfo so
column9: na hɔn ntar; na n'afowee a ɔnam do fow kɔ EWURADZE fie no; noho boow no mbordo."

column2: "Na ɔsee ɔhen no dɛ
column3: Wo ndwuma na wo nyansaa ho asɛm a metsee no wɔ mankasa m'asaase do no yɛ nokwar."

column2: "Naaso manngye hɔn nsɛm no menndzi
column3: dze bodu dɛ mebae
column4: na medze m'enyiwa mubohu yi: na
column6: saana wɔannka wo nyansaa ne kɛseyɛ ne fa mpo annkyerɛ me: ɔwo ebor nka a metsee no do koraa."

column2: "Ahomka aka wo nkorɔfo
column3: na ahomka aka wo nkowaa yi a wogyinagyina w'enyim daa

column2: "Nhyira nka w'EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn a ɔpɛ w'asɛm dɛ ɔdze wo esi n'ahengua do
column3: dɛ dzi hen ma w'EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn: na osiandɛ wo Nyankopɔn dɔ Israel
column4: dɛ ɔdze hɔn betsim hɔ daa ntsi na ɔahyɛ wo hɔn do hen
column5: dɛ ma pɛrpɛryɛ na tsenenee nyɛ edwuma."

column2: "Na ɔmaa ɔhen no sika  talent   ɔha eduonu
column3: na nduhuam piigyan
column4: na abo a ɔsom bo: na eduhuam a ɔtse dɛm dɛ mbrɛ Seba ɔhembaa no dze maa ɔhen Solomon no bi ammba bio."

column2: "Na Huram no nkowaa
column3: na Solomon no nkowaa no a wɔdze sika fi Ofir bae no
column4: wɔdze  algum   ndua na abo a ɔsom bo so bae."

column2: "Na ɔhen no dze  algum   ndua no yɛɛ EWURADZE ne fi na ɔhen ne fi no ho edum
column3: na nsankutsen na bɛnta asanku maa adwontofo no: na wonnhun bi dɛm pɛn wɔ Juda asaase do."

column2: "Na ɔhen Solomon maa Seba ɔhembaa no n'apɛdze nyinara
column3: biribiara a obisae nyina
column4: ɔsor dza ɔdze brɛɛ ɔhen no. Nna odzii ndan
column5: na osii mu kɔr nankasa n'asaase do

column2: "Afei sika a ɔbaa Solomon hɔ wɔ afe kor mu no ne nkerii yɛ sika  talent   ahaesia eduosia esia;"
"na ɔsor dza konkosifo na eguadzifo dze bae no: na Arabia ahemfo nyinara na ɔman no mu ambradofo no so wɔdze sika na dwetɛ brɛɛ Solomon."
"Na ɔhen Solomon dze sika a wɔabor yɛɛ akyɛm akɛse ahaenu: sika a wɔabor dwetɛbona ahaesia na ɔdze duraa kyɛm kor ho."
"Na ɔdze sika a wɔabor yɛɛ akyɛm nkakraba ahaasa; sika dwetɛbona ahaasa na ɔdze duraa kyɛm kor ho: na ɔhen no dze koguu Lebanon kwaa dan no mu."
"Nkyii so ɔhen no yɛɛ asombɛn ahengua kɛsenara
column3: na ɔdze sika mapa duraa ho."

column2: "Na ahengua no ho wɔ ntwerba esia
column3: nye sika ananadzegua a wɔabobɔ mu afam ahengua no ho
column4: na nsa wowɔ afa na afa wɔ atsenaa no ho
column5: na ngyata ebien gyinagyina nsa no ho."

column2: "Na ngyata duebien gyinagyina ntwerba esia no do hɔ wɔ afa ha na ha: wɔnnyɛɛ dza ɔtse dɛm bi da wɔ ahenman biara mu."
"Na ɔhen Solomon no kɔɔpow a ɔnom mu nyinara sika dze a
column3: na Lebanon kwaa dan no mu nkɔɔpow nyinara sika mapa a: dwetɛ dze wommbu no hwee wɔ Solomon ne nda no mu."

column2: "Na ɔhen no wɔ ahɛn a wɔnye Huram no nkowaa no kɔ Tarsis: mfensa biara mu Tarsis ahɛn no ba prɛko
column3: wɔdze sika kɔkɔɔ

column2: "Nna ɔhen Solomon boor asaase do ahemfo nyinara do wɔ ahonya na nyansa mu."
"Na asaase do ahemfo nyinara hwehwɛɛ Solomon n'enyim ehu
column3: dɛ wobetsie ne nyansaa a Nyankopɔn dze ahyɛ n'akoma mu no."

column2: "Na hɔn mu nyimpa biara dze n'ayɛyɛdze bae
column3: dwetɛ ndzɛmba

column2: "Na Solomon nyaa mpɔnkɔ na ntseaseanam ho mpɔnkɔdan mpemanan
column3: na mpɔnkɔdofo mpemduebien a ɔdze hɔn siesiee ntseaseanam nkurow no mu
column4: na ɔhen no nkyɛn wɔ Jerusalɛm."

column2: "Na ɔhwɛɛ ahemfo no nyinara do dze fi Esutsen no ho araa dze kodur Filistiafo asaase do
column3: na Egypt ahe do."

column2: "Na ɔhen no maa dwetɛ yɛɛ dɛ abo wɔ Jerusalɛm
column3: na ɔmaa nkyindur so yɛɛ dɛ ankye ndua a ɔwowɔ abɔnmu nkurow mu

column2: "Na wɔdze mpɔnkɔ fi Egypt
column3: na asaase nyinara brɛɛ Solomon."

column2: "Afei Solomon ho nsɛm nkaa no
column3: kan dze na ekyir dze
column4: ana wɔnnkyerɛɛw no wɔ nkɔnhyɛnyi Natan n'abakɔsɛm
column6: na ɔdzehunyi Iddo n'enyido adzehusɛm a Nebat ne ba Jeroboam hunii no mu bi a?"

column2: "Na Solomon dzii Israel nyinara do hen wɔ Jerusalɛm mfe eduanan."
"Na Solomon kɔr ne nsamankyir
column3: na wosiee no wɔ n'egya David kurow mu: na ne ba Rehoboam dzii hen wɔ n'ananmu."
